title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Strategies for Effective E-Learning Implementation and Learning Management System Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning, with over three years of practical work in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning environments by utilizing core functionalities of LMS (Learning Management System)
Learners can perform collaborative learning with peers at 80% or higher proficiency through online interaction strategies
Learners can analyze and utilize learning performance data using e-learning assessment tools
Learners can effectively integrate online and offline learning activities in blended environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
